Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Four Seasons Beijing in Beijing (Middle Chaoyang), you'll be close to Lady Street and CCTV Headquarters. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of National Agricultural Exhibition Center and Nali Patio.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 313 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Digital programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a 24-hour health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Planning an event in Beijing? This hotel has 3251 square feet (302 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Lady Street - 1 km / 0.6 mi
National Agricultural Exhibition Center - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Nali Patio - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Yashow Market - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Chaoyang Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Workers Stadium - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Green T. House Art Gallery - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Chaoyang Theater - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Tiandi Theater - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Poly Theater - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Dongsishitiao Bridge - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Dong Yue Miao - 3.5 km / 2.1 mi
CCTV Headquarters - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Lama Temple - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Ditan Park - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi

The preferred airport for Four Seasons Beijing is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 18 km / 11.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Supplement for room upgrade -CNY 2500 nett from Deluxe room to Beijing Suite -CNY 3500 neet from Deluxe room to Chairman Suite No show and early departure will be subjected to 1 night charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Rates are based on existing bedding only. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Complimentary extra bed for child under 17 years old (rollaway bed only). Non- Smoking Policy: From 1 June 2015, tobacco smoking in the hotel is prohibited by the law,which includes all guestrooms, restaurants, and public area within the hotel premises. All designated outdoor area where smoking is permitted may be assigned.
